issues.description: The problem statement and solution specify a method named `feedAllAnimals()`, but the templateâ€™s example `Main.java` calls `farm.feed()`. This mismatch will prevent students from mapping the example usage to the required `feedAllAnimals()` method and will cause compilation errors when they uncomment the sample code.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the call in `Main.java` from `farm.feed()` to `farm.feedAllAnimals()`, ensuring consistency with the problem description and solution implementation.
